title: FS N172 Tommy McCarthy St. Louis

posts.post_title: FS N172 Tommy McCarthy St. Louis
posts.post_content:
SOLD1888 Old Judge of Hall of Famer Tommy McCarthy nice contrast light pencil on reverse. I purchased this from a Board Member about 7 years ago. Nice example,asking SOLD shipped in US. 
Jonathan
Old judge Hall of Famer still available price reduced to Sold.  Delivered in US.
